item.title: Hotel-X: Float
item.description: The Float scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by IEEE 754. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/pricestatic"> PriceStatic: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/auditdata"> AuditData: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/stat"> Stat: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/price"> Price: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/exchange"> Exchange: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/markup"> Markup: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/interfaces/priceable"> Priceable: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/rule"> Rule: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/cancelpenalty"> CancelPenalty: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/objects/pricechange"> PriceChange: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/inputobjects/deltapriceinput"> DeltaPriceInput: </a> <span></span> </li>

item.title: Hotel-X: ID
item.description: The ID scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as "4") or integer (such as 4) input value will be accepted as an ID. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/inputobjects/hotelxcategoryqueryinput"> HotelXCategoryQueryInput: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> item.title: Hotel-X: Int
item.description: The Int scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1. GraphQL schema definition Required by <li class="lifields"> <a href="/hotel-x/reference/inputobjects/hotelxhotellistinput"> HotelXHotelListInput: </a> <span></span> </li> <li class="lifields"> <a
